name: Robert MORRISON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Morrison v. Commonwealth, Pennsylvania State Police

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: Robert MORRISON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Order 47 Pa.Cmwlth. 508, 408 A.2d 575, affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Lawrence J. Neary, Harrisburg, for appellant.
John L. Heaton, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
415 A.2d 89
Robert MORRISON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 23, 1980.
Decided June 18, 1980.
Lawrence J. Neary, Harrisburg, for appellant.
John L. Heaton, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
